name: Hitori
description: Eliminate duplicates by shading cells while keeping all white cells connected.
rules: Each row and column may only contain each number once in white (unshaded).
No two black cells may be adjacent orthogonally (diagonals are fine).
All white cells must form one connected orthogonal region.

achievements.title: Pure Logic
achievements.description: Solve without using Hint or Check

name: Memory Match
description: Classic card matching game - flip cards to find pairs of matching emojis.
rules: Flip two cards at a time to reveal emojis.
If they match, they stay revealed.
If they don't match, they flip back over.
